select s_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into sboard (s_no, mem_no, s_sj, s_ct, s_fl, s_rc, s_dt) values(#{s_no}, (select mem_no from member where mem_id=#{mem_id}),#{s_sj},to_clob(#{s_ct}), #{s_fl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, s_no, mem_id, s_sj, s_ct, s_fl, s_rc, s_dt, s_lk, S_lkno ,scomm_cnt from (select * from sboardlist order by s_rc desc, s_lk desc ) ) where rnum <= 5 and rnum >= 1

select * from (select rownum rnum, s_no, mem_id, s_sj, s_ct, s_fl, s_rc, s_dt, s_lk, S_lkno ,scomm_cnt from (select * from sboardlist order by s_no desc) ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * #{limit}+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{limit})
select rnum from (select rownum rnum , s_no from (select * from sboardlist order by s_no desc)) where s_no = #{s_no}
select * from (select rownum rnum, s_no, mem_id, s_sj, s_ct, s_fl, s_rc, s_dt, s_lk, S_lkno , scomm_cnt from (select * from sboardlist order by s_no desc)) where rnum = #{rnum}
mapper.update: update sboard set s_lkno = s_lkno||','||to_char(#{mem_no})||',' , s_lk = s_lk+1 where s_no=#{s_no}
